channel.title: Mc Island - Try To Survive
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]Mc Island[/size] [size=14pt]Try To Survive[/size][/center]
[size=14pt]Intro[/size] Welcome to the development of mc island, Mc stands for Multiplayer Cummunity. We are a "Starting" young company which is finding it's way trough game creating and different kinds of services.
[size=20pt]Different Games[/size] [size=14pt] - Mc Island (Rs based)[/size] Progress: 50% [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,437572.0.html]Go to project topic[/url] [size=14pt] - Mc Devana (Web Based MMO)[/size] Progress: 35% [size=14pt] - Mc Adventure (Web Based Crime-Looking)[/size] Progress: 30%
[b]Note: the first 30% of above is the scripting[/b] The Above are based of Scripts we already Made or have been made by someone else.
We are still creating the following:
[size=14pt] - Mc Woods[/size] A never seen before 2D Game.
[size=14pt] - Mc ******[/size] you can post some ideas for more games
[size=20pt]Different Services[/size] We will have a large ammount of services, for example: Web Design Banner & Logo Design 3D Models on Request T-shirts & more with your Logo on it!
[size=20pt]The Hosting[/size] We are about to get 5-10 Large Dedicated servers. We currently have: 0/10
[size=20pt]Budget[/size] since : **-**-**** (dd-mm-yyyy) Incomming cash: €00,00 Out going cash: €00,00 cash Left : €**,**
[size=20pt]Pay System[/size] Like all other companys we will pay you, altough we work with 2 systems. if you help a customer by selling one of our services you will get Paid-Per-Job for everythink you make, example a banner: you will get paid. i hear you thinking but den i can work better on my own! maybe thats true? no it isn't we grow fast under the humans, and they will come to us, and not search for someone here. so you get much more to do while working for us!
The scripting. The scripters will get paid per month, they will gain like **% Per Month of the total incomming cash.
[size=20pt]Joining The Team[/size] If you wanna join our team, please know you must be good with one of the following: nr-Name 1. Visual Basics (0/4) 2. Flash Scripting (0/4) 3. Java Scripting (1/4) 4. PhP & HtMl (1/4) 5. 3D Modelling (1/4) 6. Logo, Banners & other grapical designs (2/10) 7. C++ (0/4) 8. C# (0/4) If you are intressed in one or more of these jobs post the following
Application form
[code] Job number: Your name: Age: Experience: Proof of experience: (only if your choice is nr 6) Where do you come from: [/code]

item.title: Mc Island - Try To Survive
item.dc:creator: @HellRain-T HellRain-T
item.description:
@HellRain-T wrote:

I have 3 small server towers atm, each can host about 1000 players, but hopefully by next week my financial advisor finds some cheap large servers, but as of right now we are looking at Unity- Master Servers. Not too expensive, here is the site for those: http://unity3d.com/support/documentation/Components/net-MasterServer.html

item.title: Mc Island - Try To Survive
item.dc:creator: @HellRain-T HellRain-T
item.description:
@HellRain-T wrote:

Yes its a game business. I have an office to make it more professional. I am making a legit business. Also I would seriously consider looking at the SBA for funding. They can help you with money. They can decide to give you anywhere from $50,000-$500,000. Like I said I received $300,000 and its helping me with all my problems. Here is a link to there site. You can read more about them there: http://www.sba.gov/

Also you don’t have to start paying them back for 10 years.

Read full topic
